\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8cd99eac512a1b74080096658722295a]%mdk
$T^*: \zo^n \to \zo$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={26}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5dbc98dcc983a70728bd082d1a47546e]%mdk
$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={26}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1f80a343589323ae3f0dc99a14bc0962]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={29}
T^*(x) = \begin{cases} 
 1 & x \in S \\
 0 & x \notin S 
\end{cases}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={34}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b45ffda60604a2b58c3eaf27a070a7f4]%mdk
$U_n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={34}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={34}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[423aa01d77d09176165d8bcdeee1cc4f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={36}
\begin{aligned}
|\E[ T^*(X)] - \E[T^*(U_n)| &= \left|\sum_{x \in S} T^*(x) - \frac{1}{2^n} \sum_{x\in \zo^n} T^*(x) \right| \\
&= |1 - \frac{|S|}{2^n}| \\
&= 1 - \frac{|S|}{2^n} \\
&> 1 - 2^{\log \epsilon} \\
&= 1 - \epsilon
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f93021c5880fef54cedd2ea7dd67d522]%mdk
$\mu = \E[T_i(U_n)]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={48}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[92e4da341fe8f4cd46192f21b6ff3aa7]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={48}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a3d4ef8321298a04334174e889f966d1]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={50}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[|\E[T_i(X)] - \E[T_i(U_n)]|  > \epsilon ] &= \Pr \left[ |\sum_{x \in S} \frac{T_i(x)}{|S|}  - \mu | > \epsilon \right]  \\
&< 2^{\frac{-\epsilon^2 n}{4}}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[146440955c9312abde2174f31fc12bfc]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={62}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[D] &= \Pr[ \bigcup_i D_i ] \\
&\leq \sum_{i} \Pr[D_i] \\
&< \sum_{i} 2^{\frac{-\epsilon^2 n}{4}} \\
&= \frac{M}{2^{\frac{\epsilon^2 n}{4}}} 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk

\end{aligned}

%mdk-data-line={207}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[fad87581ebf8f471332db1f3d4e518d6]%mdk
$f'_s(\cdot)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={207}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[86b26f89eea39c4323b7489fa011ec0d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={210}
\begin{aligned}
&|\E_{s\in\zo^n}[A^{F(s,\cdot)}(1^n)] - \E_{H \gets [2^n] \to [2^n]}[A^{H}(1^n)]|\\
&= |\E_{s \in \zo^n}[A'^{F'(s,\cdot)}(1^n)] - \E_{H' \gets [2^{n/2}] \to \zo}[A'^{H}(1^n)]| \\
&> \epsilon(n/2)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
